documents.document: @cjcheesecake But under his breath lol xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake Just enjoy it, he could've called you worse lol xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake Either/or. it doesn't matter xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake Try it tomorrow after H has gone to school lol xxxxxxx
@cjcheesecake He loves his Mum bless him xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake Hmm, when Harry Met Sally springs to mind, if you remember the diner scene,might shock 'em when they hear you :-) xxxxx
@cjcheesecake Does your floor vibrate with the drilling ? If so,you know what to do :-) xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake Who would've thunk it lol :-) xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake Don't forget to turn the power on afterwards :-) xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake They drilling for oil,or just a refurb of the premises ? xxxxxx
@MelindaDPD Sweet ! :-) And Good Morning :-)
@Chelleesi I would've felt exactly the same way. Both super lovely ladies. :-)
@Chelleesi AND meeting Emelia's lovely Mum, Joanna David at the same time, I'm really happy for you :-)
@DavidJo52951945 Turn the money tap off on the 38th day and we'd be out on the 39th day. Why hang around,let's dooooooo it !
@Chelleesi Super pic !! How lucky were you !!?? :-)
@cjcheesecake I don't think the Doc would agree with the voddy Honey lol :-) xxxxxx
@carole99897 Hope we find some with guts enough to do it.This lot are about as much use as a chocolate tea-pot.
@TaleahPrince @PB4Brexit They've been so busy robbing the poor to give to the rich,now they realise their gravy train is being derailed.
@cjcheesecake Biatch lol Could've saved me a hobble to the kitchen to get one lol xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake Coffee time :-) xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake And tiring. Who'd feed H when your not around ? xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake You'd wear your fingers and thumbs out lol xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake Hahahahaha !Don't hold your breath on that happening Sweetheart :-) xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake That too xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake It'd make a change from 20 year old magazines :-) xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake lol Hmm, never fun going to the Docs,but creating it could be enjoyable xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake lol Surgery would be a little crowded ! :-) xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake That means it'll be quiet for a while then lol xxxxxx
@cindycowan1000 You don't have to try,you're a natural Honey :-) xxxxxxxxxx
@cjcheesecake What time's your Docs appointment ? xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake I'm sitting here in my dressing gown. I don't get odd looks either :-)
@cjcheesecake I grab a nap anyway,being an early riser. It helps xxxxxx
@cjcheesecake Probably will if it's that bad xxxxx
@cjcheesecake How's your bungedupness this morning ? xxxxx
@cjcheesecake LOL Morning Honey ! :-) xxxx
@IanDavidRogers1 Good ! If I get one,I'll block the source :-)
@IanDavidRogers1 I wonder if you can block them,like you can unruly people ?
@IanDavidRogers1 Never noticed to be honest,maybe I have " selective viewing " which is similar to " selective hearing " :-)
@IanDavidRogers1 I don't get any of those on my t/l.Maybe I'm just lucky.
@IanDavidRogers1 Morning Ian. Bit to early for Twitter to reply,save it for later :-)
6 people followed me and 3 people unfollowed me // automatically checked by https://t.co/3w5Pr6zG53
@JonMilligan Buy an airplane ( don't like boats/ships ) and travel the world :-)
@cindycowan1000 Outstanding Sweetie !! :-) Tweaked the knee again last night, but I'm going to be just fine thank you :-) xxxxxxxxxx
@cjcheesecake OUCH ! Bet that smarts a little xxxx
@cindycowan1000 Good Morning Favourite Beautiful Lady ! How's your Monday so far ? Hope the sun is out today for you :-) xxxxxxxxxxx
@Independent @ED_DURANCE I wonder how many will march for those kids ?.
@kensmit78058357 Pain's eased Ken,PK's have kicked in.Maybe I should sleep standing up, might be easier :-)
@AllAboutKellyHu @KellyHu The lady rocks....... PERIOD ! :-)
@al808_al I think I must've and yes,I am. Feel like Long John Silver, all I need is the parrot :-)
@al808_al Morning Aldon and thank you.Pain's died down a bit now I'm happy to say :-)
@63revg @cjcheesecake Yeah,right ! :-)
@63revg @cjcheesecake Don't even go there G lol :-)
@cjcheesecake Let me think about it for a minute..........eh Nah lol xxxxx
@cjcheesecake I'll believe it when I see it lol xxxxx
@cjcheesecake Looks like you don't put weight on anyway,a whippet probably eats more than you do xxxxx
@TheFogeys Should IndyRef2 go ahead, it will be defeated and Sturgeon will be finished for good and she knows it.
@EmiliaFox Always a pleasure to see you on our screens Lovely Lady.Hope there's more SW to come :-)
@cjcheesecake I'll have to bribe a neighbour to get me some choc, it's my only fetish xxxxx Good luck tomorrow xxxxx
@cjcheesecake Just guzzled a bacon and egg sarnie,helps the pain :-) xxxxx
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake Thanks pal :-)
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake No idea,and being older will take longer :-(
@cjcheesecake @IanDavidRogers1 Takes one to know one lol xxxxx
@cjcheesecake @IanDavidRogers1 Yes, I have them, and they work,but,not this morning at the mo xxxx
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake Inflamed ligaments.He suggested I twisted in my sleep but I can't remember rolling off Cheesy lol
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake I have no idea ! It was ok on the Friday,last week,woke up Saturday and couldn't hardly move.
@cjcheesecake @IanDavidRogers1 I'll be ok, I''m just bored not being able to move much. xxxxx
@cjcheesecake @IanDavidRogers1 I'm laid up right now,could use good entertainment :-) xxxxx
@cjcheesecake @IanDavidRogers1 That excuse is feeble lol Just do it :-) xxxx
@cjcheesecake @IanDavidRogers1 That too :-) xxxx
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake I rest my case :-)
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake I've heard that drinking too much voddy can make your clothes falloff :-)
@TheFogeys Looks like Clegg,Farron and a few others missed that bit on the voting form.
@cjcheesecake @IanDavidRogers1 No you would'nt but it'd be an experience you'd never forget lol xxxx
@cjcheesecake @IanDavidRogers1 I'd rather die eating cheesecake than be shot by one lol xxxx
@FarrdaRic Don't hold your breath.
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake Thanks mate,I hope not too.
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake I think I've taken over your spot on that lol
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake I know you have :-/
@HotOyster MPs don't have to meet him if they don't want to, but they won't go against the Queens decision to invite him.
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake I agree with that sentiment mate.
@IanDavidRogers1 @cjcheesecake Have'nt been up all night Ian,5.15 knee alarm call woke me. Morning mate.
@HotOyster It is a bit daft, seeing he's coming at the Queens personal invitation.
@cjcheesecake I'll remember you said that lol :-) xxxx
@cjcheesecake Did'nt know you liked a morning pickle ! :-)
@cjcheesecake Morning Gorgeous :-) xxxx
@cjcheesecake Mine is in the style of Friar Tuck :-) xxxx
@suekerry Morning Susan and thank you.Hopefully it won't be to long until I am :-) xx
#TwitterOn 5.15 a.m. awake again thanks to another OUCHIE moment :-(
@cjcheesecake Forgot to tell you,I'm your pillow :-) xxxx

@cjcheesecake Sounds like a real classic :-) xxxx
@edglasgow59 @hazelcowan @eoan @eddireader @SundayTimesSco Then it's up to sensible people to turn her dream into a nightmare.

@al808_al @AllAboutKellyHu Morning Aldon. Hope you're ok today.
@suekerry Afternoon Susan :-) xx
